data_footnotes:
LTE: Long Term Evolution or 4G.
• 3G: Data is only available until 2021. 3G network was deactivated in 2021.
• 5G: Data is only available from 2021.
• Due to methodological changes, the results from 2021 onwards are only comparable with previous years to a limited extend.
• Länder: Data is only available from 2021.
